display_long_description:
# School’s out, summer’s in, and your grandparents' magical farm is calling. #
Welcome to Everdream Valley VR, where you trade your stress for soil, your deadlines for ducklings, and your social anxiety for socializing with... goats. Real ones. With beards.
Get your hands dirty (literally)

[media]

# Pull weeds, water crops, plant veggies and pet animals #
All with your own hands in full immersive VR. Just grab, toss, stroke, splash and build. It's like real-life farming, but your back won’t hurt and your dog actually listens to you.
The animals are many. The attitude is real.

# Cows, pigs, ducks, alpacas, sheep, bees, deer, boars, butterflies, wolves, mice, snails #
And more! Every critter has its quirks and contributes to your farm in unique ways. 
**Warning: the chickens may be plotting something.** 
[media]
When you sleep in Everdream Valley, dreams get weird. Go into different animals dreamy kingdom in magical  minigames. Your dream actions shape the real world come morning.

Pitch tents under the stars, build epic treehouses, catch bugs, cook meals, fish for lake monsters, snap photos, decorate your home, dig for treasure – this valley is packed with bite-sized adventures and weird side quests. There may or may not be a goose uprising.

[media]
# Everdream Valley VR is a cozy, magical farming sim where nostalgia meets nature – and then throws in a goats playing soccer. #  

It’s your childhood summer break, reimagined for VR. Except here no one arrest you for throwing chikens on the roof.
